text: Following up from the previous thread: Is there a discussion somewhere about pros/cons of `TypedTables` vs. `DataFrames` and when to use one or the other? It seems like for the case where one is reading data in from a CSV or SQL query and using that as a read-only data source, `TypedTables` will be more performant.
